about_the_game:
Race around the ISS Alithea in your fully customized Vruumba! 10 items allow you to choose between different styles and colors to make your Vruumba the envy of Residents everywhere. Stay grounded with the Windmill antenna or soar to new heights with a UFO antenna. The sky's the limit! New Particle Effects included.

INCLUDED CONTENT

  • Vruumba Model #1 (Gold, 50s Wood)
  • Vruumba Model #2 (Standard, 50's Wood Pattern, Bright Red)
  • Vruumba Model #3 (Standard, 50's Wood Pattern, Blue, Yellow, Pink)
  • Vruumba Model #4 (Standard, 50's Wood Pattern, Blue, Yellow, Pink)
  • Vruumba Antenna (Windmill, UFO, UFO Emissive, Planet)
  • Particle Effects (Sparkler Effect, Fiery, Heart, Retro, Magic)
detailed_description:
Race around the ISS Alithea in your fully customized Vruumba! 10 items allow you to choose between different styles and colors to make your Vruumba the envy of Residents everywhere. Stay grounded with the Windmill antenna or soar to new heights with a UFO antenna. The sky's the limit! New Particle Effects included.

INCLUDED CONTENT

  • Vruumba Model #1 (Gold, 50s Wood)
  • Vruumba Model #2 (Standard, 50's Wood Pattern, Bright Red)
  • Vruumba Model #3 (Standard, 50's Wood Pattern, Blue, Yellow, Pink)
  • Vruumba Model #4 (Standard, 50's Wood Pattern, Blue, Yellow, Pink)
  • Vruumba Antenna (Windmill, UFO, UFO Emissive, Planet)
  • Particle Effects (Sparkler Effect, Fiery, Heart, Retro, Magic)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A microphone
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 280X or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A microphone and headphones
